member.name: T:Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.Exception.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.Exception assembly holds list of exceptions which may occur during Aggregation and Categorization service API calls. Exceptions that occur within the SDK are categorized as SDK Exceptions. For example, SerializationException, De-SerializationException, and so forth. Exceptions returned from REST services or exceptions related to network are categorized as Service Exceptions. For example, CommunicationException, RetryException, and so forth. The assembly has AggregationCategorizationException class that manages all IDS exceptions and has Error messages, Error code, Source, Inner Exception details required to handle exceptions.
